Home » 15A1 Ekakanipātapāḷi » 18 Aparaaccharāsaṅghātavagga
18.31--37
Aparaaccharāsaṅghātavagga
412--418.
447Satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti…  dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti…  vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti…  pītisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti…  passaddhisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti…  samādhisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti…  upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti… .
<< 18.26--30 up18.38--45 >>
